SEARCH
Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseController
public class UserController extends Object implements BaseController
The UserController class is responsible for handling user-related operations. It provides methods for user login and password change functionalities. This class interacts with the UserDB for database operations and uses LoginView for displaying relevant messages.
Since:
2023-10-28

    • loginUser

      public User loginUser(String userID, String password, boolean isStudent)
      Validates user credentials against the database. If the credentials are valid, it displays a successful login message. Otherwise, it displays an error message.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user's ID.
      password - The user's password.
      isStudent - A boolean to indicate if we are trying to log in a student or a staff member.
      Returns:
      The User object related to the login details provided.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String userID, String newPassword)
      Allows a user to change their password. If the password is successfully updated in the database, it displays a success message. Otherwise, it handles the error or displays a failure message.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user's ID.
      newPassword - The new password to be set for the user.
